name: Cyber Security Engineer
description:
G-CORE LABS is the world's leading global web services provider with cutting-edge features and advanced security. We provide efficient services for all modern web needs: CDN, Hosting, Storage, Media Platform, Security, Cloud.

The company was founded by experts in high-load systems designing and maintenance in 2011. Our infrastructure is based on 10000 nodes located on 5 continents. In 2013 our infrastructure was awarded the world record by the Guinness Book of Records ("Most Players Online Simultaneously on one MOG Server"). In 2014 our network served up 1 114 000 online gamers simultaneously. G-Core Labs is headquartered in Luxembourg, with offices in Moscow, Minsk, Perm, Vilnius.

What you will do:

  • Contributing to the development of strategies and architectures for Gcore’s secure cyber environments;

  • Developing cyber security anti-ddos protection technology solutions for CDN, Network and Hosting products, including application of technology in areas such as intrusion detection, data analytics, malware analysis, authentication, identity and access management;

  • Assuring the security of Gcore’s cyber environment through detection, analysis, forensics, and reverse engineering of malware;

  • Producing detailed, accurate reports of results and conclusions of analysis and engineering;

  • Participating in a cross-functional team to respond to cyber incidents and remediate attacks;

  • Collecting attack and investigation metrics and trending data;

  • Serving as Gcore’s cyber security subject matter expert on both internal and external teams.

Required Skills:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Computer

    Information Systems;

  • Five+ years of experience in the big internet

    service provider;

  • Knowledge level or certification - CCIE RS/SP;

  • Programming: Python (ability to write a scripts);

  • Work experience with:
  1. OS Systems: Unix fundamentals, Cisco IOS, IOS XR,EOS, JUNOS,
  2. Equipments: Cisco, Juniper ,Arista, Technology: TCP/IP, Ethernet, VLAN, VPN, MPLS, IPv6;
  3. Technology: TCP/IP, Ethernet, VLAN, VPN, MPLS, IPv6;

  4. Routing: EIGRP, OSPF, ISIS, BGP (All AFI), PBR, MPLS TE, PIM SM, SSM;

  5. Security: ACL, IOS firewall, IPS, AAA, Dot1x, ASA, Arbor Networks, Radware, Kentik, Anti-DDOS;

Desired Skills:

  • Ability to analyse network traffic and packet capture to understand data flows and identify anomalous behaviour;

  • Familiarity with the use of Anti-DDOS protection solutions like: Arbor PF, Radware, Check Points firewalls and other vendor-based threat mitigation;

  • Ability to analyse data structures, and TCP/IP based protocols traffic patterns;

  • Deep knowledge in network design, implementation, and administration, web services WAF protection, application servers, firewalls, routers, switches, and unique technical approaches to providing strong network security;

We offer:

  • Official employment, observance of the Labor Code of the Russian Federation;
  • Office in the center of Moscow or ability to work remotely;
  • A Full-time, flexible schedule is possible;
  • Competitive official salary;
  • Medical insurance (dental services included);
  • Corporate parties;
  • English courses (Skyeng);
  • Excellent coffee, tea, fruit, snacks in the office.
